column5: Would you like to refine your existing knowledge or completely change career direction with a master's computer science degree? From day one of the Computer Science MSc, you will be immersed in an exciting and innovative learning environment. We welcome applicants from a diverse range of academic backgrounds.You will develop broad knowledge and skills in the main areas of computing science, such as web development, computer networks and database modelling.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
